preferences.name: accessPass
preferences.description: Allow access by right-click to password fields
preferences.title: Access passwords

preferences.name: accessFormControls
preferences.description: Allow access by right-click to form controls text context (e.g., buttons, select menus, etc.)
preferences.title: Access form controls

preferences.name: showAltText
preferences.description: Copy alt attribute content in addition to displayed link text
preferences.title: Show alt attribute text

preferences.name: immediateFormClickExecution
preferences.description: When right-clicking buttons, select menus, non-text input boxes, or images, grab textual information pertaining to the form element
preferences.title: Immediate execution of a form click

preferences.name: copyLinkTextAccessKey
preferences.description: A single letter (within the phrase "Copy Link Text") to be used as an accesskey for fast keyboard access after opening the context menu. Leave blank for the default.
preferences.title: Access key for copying link text

preferences.name: highlightingEnabled
preferences.description: When right-clicking links, highlight the last selected link.
preferences.title: Highlighting enabled
